= Introduction =

[http://openvibe.inria.fr/ OpenVibe] is a open source BCI application developed by [http://www.inria.fr Inria] French National Institute for Research in Computer Science and Control. 


= Details =

It is written in C/C++. It comes with a very nice designer where you can model the flow of your EEG application. 

OpenVibe supports [http://www.emotiv.com/ Emotiv EPOCH], but you will still need Emotiv's Research SDK.
